snippet: The crew of the Gulfstream IV jet that crashed in Bedford on Saturday night made comments about aircraft control before the plane exploded, killing all on board, federal investigators said.
lead_paragraph: The crew of the Gulfstream IV jet that crashed in Bedford on Saturday night made comments about aircraft control before the plane exploded, killing all on board, federal investigators said.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Details Emerge on Fatal Jet Crash
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Details Emerge On Jet Crash
